name: Power Plant Blaster
description:
Asteroids are falling and your only hope is a Sentient Explosive Power Plant!

Made in an hour for the 1 Hour Game Jam 277: 

https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=277

Game Gets procedurally more difficult as time goes on.
(Basically Asteroids fall faster)

WASD / Arrow Keys to Move
Space to Shoot
